translation.en: [creatures] True!
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
♪ Hero, hero! ♪
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom ♪
Okay, here we go!
With Bartleby's skillful serve,
Friendship Day slowball show down has begun!
Oh, and True returns it with a stunning, spiral swoop!
Excellent elevation.
I got it!
Wait for it...
Keep waiting...
I call this the slow-mo slowball flip-flop tail-chop!
translation.ko: 이건 '슬로모션 스노 볼 공중돌기 꼬리 공격'이야!

translation.en: Hi-ya!
[laughs] Great moves, Bartleby!
Uh, where'd it go?
Okay... not a problem, I'll get the ball and stay completely dry while doing it.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 물 한 방울 안 묻히고 공 가져올 테니까

translation.en: Just... I...
Come on, ball!
Come to Bartleby...
Sorry I grabbed your tail, B, but I thought it was an emergency.
translation.ko: 꼬리 잡아서 미안한데 위급한 상황 같아서

translation.en: It was! I almost got wet!
But you would never let that happen, would you, True?
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 그걸 보고만 있진 않겠지?

translation.en: Well... not on Friendship Day.
Grizelda?
Ta-da! We're here to brighten your Friendship Day!
translation.ko: 짜잔! 우정의 날 분위기를 살려 주러 왔어!

translation.en: You brightened it alright. You got a dimmer switch on that thing?
Now that everyone's here, I have something to show you.
translation.ko: 다 모였으니까 준비한 걸 보여 줄게

translation.en: Come on!
So for Friendship Day, I made you all...
translation.ko: 우정의 날 기념으로 내가 직접 만든

translation.en: friendship bracelets!
Presents?
Thanks, True! That's so thoughtful of you.
Cool! We're all matchy-matchy.
No one told me we give presents on Friendship Day.
I would have got you all really good presents.
translation.ko: 내가 진짜 좋은 선물을 줬을 텐데

translation.en: You don't have to.
I just felt like making friendship bracelets for my friends.
translation.ko: 난 친구들 주고 싶어서 만들었을 뿐이야

translation.en: And there are lots of different ways you can show you care on Friendship Day.
translation.ko: 그리고 꼭 선물로 우정의 날을 챙길 필요는 없어

translation.en: Like baking nummleberry cookies to share! Want one?
translation.ko: 넘믈열매 쿠키를 나눠 먹어도 되고 하나 줄까?

translation.en: Oh great, now we're sharing too.
And friends look after each other, like, um...
translation.ko: 친구를 도와주는 방법도 있어 예를 들면...

translation.en: when True saved me from getting wet.
translation.ko: 트루가 젖을 뻔한 날 구한 것처럼!

translation.en: Here you go, Frookie.
But I didn't make gifts or bake cookies or save anyone.
translation.ko: 난 선물이나 쿠키도 안 가져왔고 구조도 안 했어

translation.en: I didn't do anything nice!
When do I get to be nice?
Well, we couldn't have Friendship Day without you.
You were there for us when we needed you.
translation.ko: 우리가 필요로 할 때 와 줬다고

translation.en: Well, I am really good at showing up.
[Grizelda screams] A grippity-grab!
Get it off! [screams]
True, get it off me!
Okay, hold still and I'll grab it...
Yikes!
Okay. Gimme a sec.
There's got to be a right way to remove a grippity-grab.
[Grizelda] Ooh! Hurry! Yikes! It's a grippity-grab snack attack!
Save the snacks!
Shoo! Shoo! Get off!
[gasps] Frookie! Look out!
A grippity is after your pretty neckerchief!
Hey! The grippities are taking all our fashion accessories!
Since when do grippity-grabs care about style?
They don't. But they do like shiny things.
In fact, legend has it there's a giant grippity-grab in the sea
with a whole cave full of shiny treasure.
So if the grippity-grabs like shiny things...
Here little grippity, want this?
Problem solved!
[sighs] You saved me, True.
[gasps] You saved me!
And you gave up your bracelet to do it!
You're such a great friend!
It's no big deal. I'm just glad you're okay.
translation.ko: 별거 아니야 네가 안 다쳐서 다행이지

translation.en: I'm a great friend too. Just you wait and see!
I'm going to get your bracelet back.
Stop! Come back with True's bracelet!
[Bartleby] Yeah and my glasses!
Yeah, nummleberry cookies don't work so well as sunglasses.
translation.ko: 넘믈열매 쿠키는 선글라스 대신 못 쓰겠네

translation.en: Mmm. But they taste great.
You come back here, you little grippities! You are ruining Friendship Day!
translation.ko: 이리 오라니까! 너희가 우정의 날을 망쳤잖아!

translation.en: Being a good friend is harder than I thought.
I'll just make True a new, even better friendship bracelet.
translation.ko: 그냥 트루한테 더 예쁜 팔찌를 만들어 줘야겠다

translation.en: Out of extra special, super sparkly seashells, handpicked by me.
Patience, Frookie-kins. We'll play as soon as I'm done being thoughtful.
translation.ko: 좀 기다려 좋은 친구 노릇 끝내고 놀아 줄게

translation.en: Ta-da! All done. Isn't it irresistible?
Of course it is!
Hey!
You must be that giant grippity-grab who collects shiny things.
Look, I totally get liking pretty things,
but I'd like my bracelet back now please.
Hey! Give it back! [grunts]
That's not a toy, you know!
I made that for a friend.
What? No. Not you.
A princess can't be friends with someone so shellfish.
translation.ko: 공주는 너 같은 욕심 대왕 그리피티랑 친구 안 해

translation.en: No fair! I can't swim that far.
I'm not some fish, you know.
What did you just do?
And why do my feet fell all floppy?
My perfect princess toes!
How am I supposed to try on new shoes?
I thought Grizelda would be back by now.
Let's go find her.
That shouldn't be too hard.
Just follow that bright light.
-Um... that's the sun, Bartleby. -Oops.
Um, hi, Mr Sun! Happy Friendship Day!
We should be able to follow Grizelda's footprints in the sand.
Good idea, Zee. Let's go!
Give it back! [grunts]
This... day...
is... not... going like I planned.
Oops, sorry, Frookie.
I'm not used to having a floppy fish tail.
Wait here, Frookie-kins.
I just have to catch Grippity, get my friendship bracelet,
and make him turn me back into a whole princess
so I don't have to spend the rest of my life in the sea.
Bing, bing, boom! I'll be back soon.
Toodles!
Look at that shine...
it's Grizelda!
With a giant grippity-grab!
The legend is true!
Grizelda has a fish tail!
What happened, Frookie?
Isn't it obvious what happened?
Grizelda would rather spend Friendship Day with a giant grippity than with us!
translation.ko: 그리젤다가 우리를 버리고 대왕 그리피티랑 우정의 날을 즐기는 거야!

translation.en: Don't worry, Frookie, we'll take care of you.
translation.ko: 우리가 놀아 줄 테니까 걱정 마, 프루키

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, the things we do for our friends. Yuck.
Grizelda would never leave Frookie behind.
Especially on Friendship Day.
I think Grizelda needs our help. We have to go and save her.
Wait, what? Like go in the water?
Yes, but since we haven't been turned into fish, we'll need Wish help!
translation.ko: 근데 우린 물고기가 될 수 없으니 소원의 도움이 필요해!

translation.en: Cumulo!
Come on, Frookie, you too.
To the Wishing Tree, please!
Happy Friendship Day to you too, Wishes!
But there's no time to chat, our friend needs our help!
translation.ko: 근데 친구가 위험해서 수다 떨 시간이 없어

translation.en: Right.
Let's sit...
and have a think.
Okay, True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.ko: 좋아, 트루, 소원 나무가 어떻게 도와주면 될까?

translation.en: Well, we think a giant grippity-grab turned Grizelda into a...
...an extra shiny fish-girl.
So I need a Wish to undo the spell and turn Grizelda back into herself.
translation.ko: 주문을 풀고 그리젤다를 원래대로 되돌릴 소원이 필요해

translation.en: And since Grizelda is under the sea,
I need a Wish that will allow me to travel underwater.
translation.ko: 바닷속에서 이동할 수 있는 소원도 필요하고

translation.en: It's Friendship Day, we should all go and help.
translation.ko: 우정의 날이니까 다 같이 구하러 가자

translation.en: -[Frookie barks] -As long as I can stay completely dry.
Alright.
I need a Wish that will take us all underwater.
translation.ko: 우리 모두를 물속에 데려갈 소원이 필요해

translation.en: The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
It is time to get your three Wishes.
translation.ko: 이제 세 가지 소원을 골라 봐

translation.en: I'm ready.
Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree,
please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
[True] ♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
-♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪ -Subba!
translation.ko: 작은 소원 하나, 둘, 셋 서바!

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
Un-Doo!
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
Shim-Shim!
♪ Magic power ♪
♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
What an inspiring combination of Wishes!
I can't wait to see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
So this is Subba.
-Hi, Subba! -[Subba chirps]
Subba is an underwater Wish.
Subba gets big enough to fit all your friends inside and keep them dry.
translation.ko: 우리를 태울 만큼 커지고 물에 젖지 않게 해 줘

translation.en: Oh, I like him! Best Wish yet.
That's perfect! Subba will help us all travel underwater to find Grizelda.
translation.ko: 딱 좋아! 서바로 바다에 들어가 그리젤다를 찾으면 되겠다

translation.en: Your next Wish is... Un-Doo.
Well, hell-oo, Un-Doo.
Un-Doo!
[Zee] This is a reversing Wish.
When it spins backwards over something, it undoes it.
translation.ko: 뭔가를 두고 거꾸로 돌면 원래대로 돌아가는데

translation.en: But Un-Doo can only be used once.
translation.ko: 대신 딱 한 번밖에 못 써

translation.en: If this Wish can turn Grizelda back into a two-legged princess,
translation.ko: 이 소원으로 그리젤다가 다시 인간 공주가 된다면

translation.en: then Un-Doo only has to work once.
And your last wish is... Shim-Shim.
Shim-Shim has helped us once before.
It's a wish that's really good at wiggling.
Hello again, Shim-Shim! That... [giggles] tickles!
I'm not sure how wiggling can help save Grizelda, but I'll think of something.
translation.ko: 이걸로 어떻게 그리젤다를 구할지 모르겠지만 무슨 수든 있겠지

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
Now let's go get our friend Grizelda.
Thank you, Wishing Tree! Happy Friendship Day!
translation.ko: 고마워, 소원 나무 즐거운 우정의 날!

translation.en: How do fish swim with these floppy tails anyway?
-[grunts] -Excuse me, coming through.
You can't catch me! [gibbers]
You can't get away from me that easy, Grippity.
translation.ko: 내가 못 잡을 줄 알아, 그리피티?

translation.en: This fish tail is supremely annoying.
Uh... thanks?
So you're giving me the bracelet back?
I guess not.
Poor little, Frookie.
You miss Grizelda, don't you?
But don't worry, we'll find her under all that water,
translation.ko: 우리가 바다에 들어가 찾아올 테니까 안심해

translation.en: won't we, True?
You bet! Time for my first Wish!
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Subba, Wish come true!
Hi, Subba! We need to go under the sea to find Grizelda.
Can you help us out?
Uh-huh! Subba!
All aboard!
[True] Okay, Subba, into the sea!
[True] Everybody keep an eye out for Grizelda.
translation.ko: 다들 눈 크게 뜨고 그리젤다를 찾아봐

translation.en: She should be pretty easy to spot with that shiny tail.
translation.ko: 꼬리가 반짝반짝 빛나서 딱 눈에 띌 거야

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I see it! Yeah, behind that rock!
Uh, that way, Subba.
Boom, boom!
Hmm, that's not her. It's a school of fish.
All those fish are wearing the same tail as Grizelda.
She is not gonna be happy with that.
Hey! How are we going to spot Grizelda if everything has a shiny tail?
translation.ko: 다들 꼬리가 빛나는데 그리젤다를 어떻게 찾지?

translation.en: Don't worry, Frookie. Grizelda is down here somewhere. We'll find her.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 프루키 그리젤다는 여기 어디 있으니까 꼭 찾아 줄게

translation.en: [Zee] But how?
It's not as easy as following her tracks in the sand.
Right, she can't leave footprints if she doesn't have feet.
translation.ko: 맞아, 그리젤다는 발이 없어서 발자국도 안 남기잖아

translation.en: Grizelda may not be leaving tracks but Giant Grippity is!
translation.ko: 그리젤다가 아니라도 대왕 그리피티의 발자국은 있겠지!

translation.en: [Zee] Good thinking, True!
Told ya, Frookie! True will find Grizelda in no time.
translation.ko: 그거 봐, 프루키! 트루가 곧 찾아 줄 거야

translation.en: [True] Okay, Subba, follow those tracks.
No fair! [grunts]
You know I can't walk out of the water into... [gasps]
[Grizelda] ...this amazing cave!
Your home is almost as nice as my palace.
So many pretty shiny things!
[gasps] Including me!
I'm not a half-fish,
I'm an adorable, glamorous, unbelievably cute mermaid!
translation.ko: 사랑스럽고 매력 넘치는 귀엽기 그지없는 인어야!

translation.en: If only my friends could see me now!
I miss them, you know, especially my best friend Frookie.
translation.ko: 다들 보고 싶다 특히 내 단짝인 프루키

translation.en: And Zee and Bartleby and True...
She's the one I made the beautiful bracelet for.
You know how it is with friends.
Oh! Maybe not.
Oh, thank you!
I have to give this to True for Friendship Day to show what an amazing friend I am.
translation.ko: 이걸 우정의 날 선물로 줘야 좋은 친구로 보이지

translation.en: Ooh, a pearl!
It's so beautiful.
I love shiny things.
Wait a sec! Is this for me?
So you want to be friends?
Yeah, yeah! Yeah, yeah, yeah!
All that chasing and hiding was just playing?
translation.ko: 그럼 같이 놀자고 도망치고 숨고 했어?

translation.en: Well of course a princess and a grippity can be friends!
translation.ko: 공주랑 그리피티도 친구 할 수 있지!

translation.en: We have so much in common...
We both love shiny things, we both have beautifully decorated homes.
translation.ko: 둘 다 반짝이를 좋아하고 예쁘게 꾸민 집이 있잖아

translation.en: [gasps] Next time you can come to my house!
I'll have my Grizmos build us a waterpark and we can decorate it together!
translation.ko: 그리즈모한테 워터 파크를 만들어 달래서 같이 꾸미자!

translation.en: Won't that be fun?
After you turn me back into a princess of course!
translation.ko: 그럼 먼저 날 공주로 되돌려 놔!

translation.en: [Grizelda] Oh, no!
Where's your magic thingy?
-[Grippity gasps] -[Grizelda] The clam has it!
Grippity, you have to get it out and change me back!
translation.ko: 그리피티, 저걸 꺼내서 날 되돌려 줘!

translation.en: Oh no!
[grunts] Can you use your pincers to cut yourself free?
If only my friend True were here. She'd know what to do!
translation.ko: 내 친구 트루가 있다면 방법을 알 텐데!

translation.en: Maybe...
True!
Help!
Grizelda?
[Grizelda] Help!
That way, Subba!
[Subba] Subba!
[Grizelda squeals] My Frookie-kins!
True, I knew you'd come find me.
Wow! It is Grizelda.
And she really is a half-fish!
I'm not a half-fish, I'm a whole mermaid, thank you very much.
translation.ko: 반 물고기나 아니라 인어라고 불러 주면 고맙겠어

translation.en: Did the giant grippity do this to you?
Yes, but he can't turn me back.
translation.ko: 응, 근데 되돌려 줄 순 없어

translation.en: No problem! We'll undo his spell with my second Wish!
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 내 두 번째 소원으로 그 마법을 풀면 돼!

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
-Wake up, Un-Doo! -[gibbers excitedly]
Wish come true!
This Wish can reverse what Grippity did to you.
translation.ko: 이걸로 그리피티가 네게 건 마법을 취소할 수 있어

translation.en: Really? So, you can use your Wish to undo what he did to himself?
translation.ko: 그럼 그 소원으로 줄에 걸린 그리피티도 풀어 줄 수 있어?

translation.en: He was trying to help me and he got all tangled up.
He was trying to help you... like a friend?
Well... yes.
He really is my friend.
A princess and a grippity can be friends, you know.
translation.ko: 공주랑 그리피티도 친구 할 수 있어

translation.en: Grizelda, I can only use Un-Doo once.
translation.ko: 그리젤다 언두는 한 번밖에 못 써

translation.en: If Un-Doo frees Grippity, I don't have a Wish to turn you back.
translation.ko: 언두로 그리피티를 풀어 주면 널 도와줄 방법이 없어

translation.en: Then... [sighs]
...use the Wish to free Grippity.
[all] What?!
We're friends now.
And friends are always there for you when you need them. Right?
translation.ko: 필요할 때 도와줘야 친구잖아 안 그래?

translation.en: But what about you?
Grippity is the one who really needs help. I'm fine.
translation.ko: 그리피티가 더 도움이 급하니까 난 괜찮아

translation.en: Um, Grizelda? You may not have noticed, but you have a fish tail.
translation.ko: 그리젤다? 까먹었나 본데 너 물고기 꼬리 달고 있어

translation.en: It's a mermaid tail! And being a mermaid isn't so bad.
translation.ko: 인어 꼬리거든! 그리고 인어 생활도 할 만해

translation.en: But... you have to live in water!
Not a problem. I already have plans for a water park.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 벌써 워터 파크도 생각해 놨어

translation.en: And I could give Frookie swimming lessons.
-[barks] -[gasps] She did not mean that!
Grizelda, are you sure?
I'm sure. Let's do this.
Okay, Un-Doo, do your thing!
[Un-Doo chirps excitedly] Un-Doo!
Yeah!
Good job, Un-Doo!
Nice work, Un-Doo. Now back in the pack.
I knew you could do it, True!
Thanks, B. Grizelda, that was very generous of you.
translation.ko: 고마워, 비 그리젤다, 너 진짜 착하다

translation.en: Are you sure you'll be okay being a half-fish...
I-I-I mean mermaid?
Well, it was nice having a super sparkly tail,
and I was starting to get the hang of swimming.
But I do love my fancy shoes and running around with my little Frookie-kins.
translation.ko: 근데 예쁜 신발 신고 프루키랑 뛰어다니는 것도 좋아

translation.en: Sorry, Grizelda. I don't think my last wish can turn you back into a princess.
translation.ko: 미안해, 그리젤다 내 마지막 소원은 널 공주로 되돌릴 순 없어

translation.en: [Bartleby] What's Grippity doing? What's going on?
[Grizelda] Oh, Grippity's magic thingy is inside that clam.
translation.ko: 그리피티의 마법 도구가 저 조개 안에 있거든

translation.en: His Trident? The same one he used to turn you into a mermaid?
translation.ko: 삼지창 말이야? 널 인어로 만들었던 거?

translation.en: [Grizelda] Of course!
But that clam clammed up and won't give it back.
translation.ko: 근데 조개가 꽉 물고 안 돌려줘!

translation.en: I think we can fix that.
Time for my third Wish.
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Shim-Shim! Wish come true!
Shim-Shim the wiggle Wish? How will that help?
translation.ko: 쉼쉼은 꿈틀꿈틀 소원이잖아? 그걸로 뭘 해?

translation.en: Remember how Shim-Shim tickled my arm in the Wishing Tree?
translation.ko: 쉼쉼이 소원 나무에서 내 팔을 간질였잖아?

translation.en: I bet a little tickle can get that grumpy clam to loosen up!
Um, I still don't get it.
[laughs] That tickles!
See? You can't laugh with your mouth closed.
Oh, my!
So if the Clam laughs, it will open.
Okay, Shim-Shim, wiggle away!
Shim-Shim makes the first move, the classic fast-slow-fast tickle.
translation.ko: 쉼쉼이 정석대로 빠르고 느리게를 반복하고 있어

translation.en: Oh! Clam blocks that move!
There'll be no laughing today.
Shim-Shim is really upping her game.
[Bartleby] Clam is having a hard time ignoring the tickles.
Shim-Shim is tickling up, down and all around and shows no sign of stopping!
translation.ko: 쉼쉼이 사방을 오가며 간지럼을 태워 그리고 멈출 생각을 안 해!

translation.en: [Bartleby] Uh-oh, Clam can't take it and...
The clam is open, folks! The clam is open!
Now it's all up to Grippity to finish this. Here it comes!
-[gibbers] -[Zee and Bartleby] Score!
You did it, Shim-Shim! Great job!
Now back in the pack.
Shim-Shim!
It's all up to Grippity now.
[gasps] I have legs again!
Thank you, Grippity. I knew you could do it.
translation.ko: 고마워, 그리피티 넌 해낼 줄 알았어

translation.en: Good to have you back, Grizelda!
It's good to be back with all my friends.
Now can we get back to celebrating Friendship Day up on the beach?
translation.ko: 이제 해변에서 우정의 날 파티를 계속할까?

translation.en: I'm still a little nervous under the sea.
Just a second.
Grippity?
For you, Grippity. You've earned it, my friend.
[True] Thanks for the great ride, Subba.
Now back in the pack.
What a great Friendship Day! We all really stuck together like good friends do.
translation.ko: 멋진 우정의 날이다! 우린 좋은 친구답게 똘똘 뭉쳤잖아

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, okay, stop it.
[laughs] We're friends, I know.
I think the best thing is that Grizelda started a new tradition for Friendship Day.
translation.ko: 그리젤다가 만든 새로운 우정의 날 전통이 최고 같아

translation.en: -[Grizelda] I did? -Ha!
Make a new friend!
Yep, I am pretty awesome!
[Bartleby] Oh, that is so Grizelda!
